reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FDW Metal Dining Chairs - Stylish, Sturdy, and Versatile Seating Solutions!
reviews.reviewText: The FDW Metal Dining Chairs Set of 4 has truly elevated my dining and outdoor seating experience with its winning combination of sleek design, robust construction, and versatility. These chairs effortlessly blend form and function, making them a standout addition to any space.First and foremost, the modern design of these metal dining chairs adds a touch of contemporary flair to my dining area and patio. The clean lines and minimalist silhouette contribute to a chic aesthetic that complements various decor styles, from traditional to modern.The sturdiness of the metal construction is a key highlight. These chairs are built to last, providing a stable and reliable seating solution for both indoor and outdoor use. The powder-coated finish adds durability, ensuring resistance to rust and wear, even in different weather conditions.The versatility of these chairs is impressive. Whether arranged around a dining table, used as patio seating, or as stylish accents in various living spaces, these chairs seamlessly adapt to different settings. The stackable design allows for convenient storage, making them ideal for compact living spaces.Assembly was a breeze, thanks to the straightforward instructions and all the necessary hardware included. The chairs were easy to put together, and the sturdy construction became evident as each piece came together.The comfort factor is not compromised despite the metal construction. The ergonomic design of the chairs provides ample support, making them suitable for extended periods of seating. The backrest and seat offer a comfortable and enjoyable dining experience.The set of four chairs provides an excellent value for those in need of multiple seating solutions. The affordability of the FDW Metal Dining Chairs does not sacrifice quality, making them a budget-friendly yet premium choice for enhancing your living spaces.Cleaning and maintenance are hassle-free with these metal chairs. A simple wipe-down with a damp cloth keeps them looking fresh, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.In conclusion, the FDW Metal Dining Chairs Set of 4 is a stellar choice for anyone seeking stylish, durable, and versatile seating solutions. Whether for everyday dining or entertaining guests, these chairs deliver on both aesthetics and functionality. If you're in search of high-quality metal chairs that offer a perfect blend of style and durability, look no further. This set is a definite five-star recommendation! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive Looking Bargain
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are built with sturdy, quality materials. Great as Bistro seating outdoors or Stylish dining inside. Smooth edges. Easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: For the quality would expect to spend double the price. Packaging excellent, no damage. Product simple to assemble. The 4 bolts per chair were color matched black. The bolts also had blue loktite on threads so should stay tight. The chairs are compact size and fit the tight space in breakfast area perfectly. Buyer should be aware of the size of chair which is on the website before purchase. Finish was not to shiny but closer to a mat black. Finish had only minor flaws of no real visual problem. Only minor compalint concerned the rubber like leg bottom protectors. The center of protector had a hard plastic like round protrusion in the center almost flush with rubber. This might scratch some floor finishes. I added stick on 1 " diameter non slip pads that should cure that potential problem. Cannot speak to longevity of chairs but expect should hold up well. Appear sturdy enough and suitable for indoor or occasional dry outside use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Solid Chairs
reviews.reviewText: We made a small outdoor granite-topped dining table for our porch and needed a couple of dining chairs. These chairs work very well for us. They are small and light weight, and are comfortable, especially with the cushions we also ordered from Amazon. The chairs are power-coated steel but our porch is covered and we will not leave them outside in the winter so they should hold up fine. Considering how inexpensive these were, we are very pleased with them.We ordered 4 chairs, They arrived very nicely packaged in one box. Instructions and the necessary hardware were included. One of the corners of the box was pretty badly crushed so the driver had me check the chairs. They were completely undamaged. A testament to good packing. Assembly was straight forward. Just be sure to not tighten the bolts until you have all of them started.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are very sturdy, perfect color (more white than "cream"), and a great price. I got 8 of them and it took me about an hour to put them all together. Packaged well. However, these chairs aren't perfect. They do have some welding dents and two had scratches. Not perfect, but still good quality. Would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy chairs
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with these chairs are not only stylish but also incredibly sturdy. They've added a modern touch to our space and I know they will hold up to daily use as this is my fourth time purchasing for my business. The metal construction gives them a durable feel, and they are surprisingly comfortable for metal chairs. What's even more impressive is that they are easy to clean, which is a huge plus for a busy business like mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy chairs.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice red color. They matched my 80 ywar old enamel top table perfectly. I would definitely buy these again. Great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described
reviews.reviewText: These are great sturdy chairs and super easy to assemble. Comes with everything needed. Just what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewerName: And don’t call me ShirleyAnd don’t call me Shirley
reviews.reviewTitle: Such a score, I am SO pleased!
reviews.reviewText: Not only are these classic Tolix Marais style chairs attractive (I LOVE the matte black finish) and comfortable, but I got all four for just $99.99 taxes & shipping included. You can’t even find chairs that inexpensive at IKEA for pete's sake! These are well made; constructed from solid steel that feels sturdy and strong, yet is surprisingly light too making them easy to lift for stacking . They were delivered SO quickly! I ordered them on Sep. 22 and they were delivered to my door midday on Sep. 24. They came carefully packaged, arriving in pristine condition, and were very easy to assemble. It took just four screws to attach each back to the seat (the screws & Allen keys are all included). In no more than 30 minutes the chairs went from a few parts in a box, to fully assembled and tucked up to my dining table. I love them! They are exactly what I wanted in terms of style and quality, and the super afforable price was a definite bonus! I could not be more pleased with my purchase and I absolutely would not hesitate to recommend/order from this company again.
Love these chairs. Nice and sturdy. Also stackable. For the price they are awesome.
Good quality and easy to assemble. Don't really understand the black lines on the cornering parts but it still looks great.
I bought the set of 4 in blackDelivery and packaging was greatEasy to assembleComfortable and sturdy
These chairs are great other stores sell them for much more assembly is super easy and the looks and feel great after having them for months now they are holding up really well
